source.sqlReaderQuery: select r.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r
select r.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r

select r.GroupID, r.UserID, r.CredentialID, r.DateAdded, r.ValidUntil, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.Reference, r.Notes,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserCredential] r
select r.UserID, r.RoleID, r.GroupId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRole] r

select r.Id, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.UserID, r.GroupId, r.RoleId, r.DateRequested,r.ActionID,r.Success, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRoleAudit] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RegistrationFormVariant, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RegistrationJourney] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RequestHelpFormVariant, r.TargetGroups,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RequestHelpJourney] r

select r.ID, r.RequestId, r.SupportActivityID, r.Details, r.DueDate, r.IsHealthCritical, r.JobStatusID, r.VolunteerUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Job] r
select r.JobID, r.GroupID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r
select r.JobID, r.QuestionID, r.Answer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r

select r.JobID, r.JobStatusID, r.DateCreated, r.VolunteerUserID, r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[RequestJobStatus] r
select r.ActivityID, r.QuestionID, r.[Order], CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r
select r.ID, r.[Name], r.QuestionType, r.[Required],r.AdditionalData, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r

select r.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r

select r.ID,  r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName
from [Request].[Request] r 
where RequestorType is not null or OrganisationName is not null
select r.RequestId, r.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r
select u.UserID,u.PostalCode, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[ChampionPostcode] u
select u.UserID,u.RegistrationStep,u.DateCompleted, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[RegistrationHistory] u
select u.UserID,u.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[SupportActivity] u

select u.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u
